attributes.action: Improve Customer Satisfaction Levels for the UK Government (UK Plc)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK government should be run as a business serving its customers (citizens) and the government should monitor customer satisfaction levels with a view to keeping them as high as possible.  Government Customer Service needs to be greatly improved because the existing channels of communicating with MPs, Ministerial Departments, the Prime Minister and now through e-petitions are not working well enough.  There needs to be a government Customer Service Department to oversee all customer service matters ensuring that all customer feedback is processed with high levels of intelligence and that citizens get quality responses.
